website_summaries.verdict: Meteorically comfortable on day one—this is a fitting description for Ahnu’s Sugarpine II Waterproof Ripstop. It is also a kind of shoe that may be described as unbelievably watertight and beautiful to behold. That said, this head-turner of a hiker is not without a couple of criticisms, the more distressing of which would have to be its sizing inconsistencies. Nonetheless, the Sugarpine II Waterproof Ripstop from Ahnu is a superb package female hiking enthusiasts can be proud of wearing come rain or shine.
pros: A multitude of owners raves about the fantastic level of comfort offered by the Ahnu Sugarpine II Waterproof Ripstop
The shoe living up to its waterproof moniker has stunned numerous verified purchasers
Many users gave the Sugarpine II Waterproof Ripstop sparkling remarks in the area of aesthetics
A good percentage of them couldn’t hold back in calling the footgear cute
This quality shoe built for trail pursuits impresses several reviewers with its quick break-in phase
Its great ability to stick to a variety of surfaces mesmerizes about a handful of trail lovers
Some patrons commend the hiker’s amazingly roomy toe box
A couple of buyers find their Ahnu Sugarpine II Waterproof Ripstop hiking shoes incredibly light
cons: The Ahnu women’s Sugarpine II Waterproof Ripstop hiking shoe has been blasted by a few testers for being too bulky
The heel back is too high which causes a little rubbing at the back of the ankle, notes a couple of reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Not the good old Ahnu Sugarpine
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 or 3 pairs of Ahnu Sugarpine waterproof hiking shoes. Loved them. These are just not the same. Big, sloppy fit and uncomfortable. I wish they would repeat the original. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Hiking shoe that slips on wet surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits small for me, very stiff and uncomfortable. Socks need to be sturdy as they will fall down because the uppers are constantly hitting them. BUT, most importantly, I bought these to walk around cobblestones in Europe, hike in AZ and I am slipping and sliding on the shoe that advertises 'good traction'! Rainy day in AZ, tried to give these shoes another chance, stepped up on the running board of the expedition, slipped off and banged my knee. Then walked up the saltillo sidewalk and almost went down if not for my husband holding my hand! This happens on wet sidewalk, driveways, etc. I just can't wear these! Past return date or they'd be gone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Eades

customer_reviews.title: Ahnu Sugarpine Waterproof hikers
customer_reviews.text: I am an ardent fan of Ahnu shoes and wear both the Sugarpine sneakers/hikers and the Montarra's. This is the first I've gotten the waterproof Sugarpine sneaker/hiker. And they are much stiffer than the non-waterproof edition. I'll probably get used to them and they'll loosen up, but I've been accustomed to just putting them on and loving them, that I'm ever so disappointed in the fact they don't feel as comfortable. Went for a couple mile hike and my feet were hot. But I also felt they are well-built and should hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, perfect 10
customer_reviews.text: I live in these shoes, my favorites, and my 4th pair. I buy 1-2 pairs a year, high top and low top. They are INCREDIBLY durable and water resistant. And yes, I get compliments every time I wear them! They are unbelievably comfortable and easy to spot clean. I have had both hips replaced, yet I insist on staying active- these are the only shoes I have found that provide both comfort and stability for rigorous hiking. I have custom orthodics that fit PERFECTLY in these shoes. Wish I had a pair in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe with a good vibram sole
customer_reviews.text: My wife was looking for good shoe for when she needs something waterproof. These fit the bill. She doesn't like to wear shoes (mainly wears Sanuk sandals) but she said they are quite comfortable and are true to size. They are a little heavier than a regular shoe but not very much. She really likes the rounded toe as it just adds to the overall comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great waterproof shoe that I mostly wear to walk the dog in any weather. Love the fact that these shoes are waterproof because i can walk through dewy grass or in the rain and so far, my feet have remained dry. The shoes took a few wears to feel comfortable but I'm happy with how they fit now. I had a similar pair of Ahnu shoes before that had an additional hole for laces at the ankle. I thought that i would really need it but turns out, these are fine without it.
customer_reviews.author: Dynamomo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shie
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is exactly what I was looking for, a : a lightweight waterproof walking shoe. I have difficulty finding a shoe that offers the arch support and in my size - a half size that this shoe delivered. I have been breaking them in and after walking the length of the hard floor mall in these shoes I did not suffer any back or leg pain. These are great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Geralyn R. Koblis

customer_reviews.title: oh my these are cute!
customer_reviews.text: black with teal laces and trim fits comfortable even tho im pregnant and my feet are swollen right now fits comfortable even tho i am wearing my thickest socks theres even some space behind my heel <3 very satisfied so far! must go but i will add pics and update later on. I have a pair of boots that are Ahnu brand and i love them so much. Thanks Ahnu
customer_reviews.author: Liz E.

customer_reviews.title: Like it is made for my foot
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with how comfortable this shoe is. I bought my first pair of Teva sandals last year and they are wonderful. I wanted a closed toe hiking shoe now instead of wearing sneakers. Had a hard time finding something I liked. This shoe is beautiful. I get compliments on it. I typically wear a 5-1/2 but purchased a 5 and it fits like a glove. No hot spots after my first hike. I can't wait to get out in them again.
customer_reviews.author: titaniumbutt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a comfortable everyday winter shoe so it had to be waterproof. So far, this has worked out great. The sole has some spring to it, not hard like some hiking shoes. The toe box allows plenty of room, while the lacing adds support. I might try the higher boots as well.
customer_reviews.author: Upstate Judith

customer_reviews.title: Not the same!  Changes from original are all bad
customer_reviews.text: Poor construction, seems like a Payless shoe now. Wife HATED it and immediately returned. Went on ebay and bought old model and they again are much better than this updated and down quality 2nd edition. Regarding the seller: Delivery is was quick and well packaged. No problems with return. It is not the seller's fault that the manufacturer ruined this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: TommyS

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertising - not waterproof at all....but a good hiker
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I've ordered. I really like the fit and quality. Very comfortable with a wide toe box and well fitting heel. However,these shoes are not waterproof at all. Not a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Wore it for long periods and was pretty comfy. Didn't make my feet sweat as much as my last pair. Water beaded up on top. Update: Started to change color a bit. Blue to a slight bluish-purple. Still a comfy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kozee

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and real Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I have so many versions of this shoe. I'm outdoors on my feet all day in all weather in woods with dogs. They hold up well and feel good. Bought some for my workers too. They all loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Put it right on out of the box, and I don't like socks..no blisters! I'm warming them up for a longer backcountry hike with some local hikes and am very happy so far. The toe box seems a little wider than normal which makes for a very comfy bend in the toe box when you are walking up hill, no pinching on the toes. I've had no rubbing or hot spots at all and the laces stay tied. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison B.

customer_reviews.title: NOT like the original ahnu Sugarpine’s
customer_reviews.text: These just arrived. They feel much inferior quality to the original ahnu Sugaroine’s, which I loved!! The originals fit like slippers from the moment I put them on, with great arch support, a roomy toe box, and plenty of cushion around the ankles. These are less roomy in the toe box, rub around the ankles and just feel cheap to me. They are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Wide fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe didn’t fit right at all for me. It was too wide, but the length was ok. I had to tie the laces really tight to keep the heel from slipping off when I walked. Shoe itself looked nice, but when I tried them on the toe box was wide and didn’t look good. Awkward fit so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I was used to.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to replace my Ahnu shoes I loved with the replacement made by TEVA. See the attached picture really says it all.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not very comfortable after wearing for more than a couple of hours. The backs and sides dig into my feet/ankle if I walk a lot, which is what I bought these shoes for.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof as described :(
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shoes for my wife and on her first time using them she stepped on a little puddle of water and got water immediately inside her shoe coming from the bottom.. looks like from the center little blue section on the bottom of the sole so not water proof as they described.
customer_reviews.author: Luis D.

customer_reviews.title: Gunboats
customer_reviews.text: I have these in red and wanted another color. This pair felt big and clunky. Same size as my red ones but completely different fit. They are going back.
customer_reviews.author: baysil

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: These have only just arrived. I did try them on and they seem a little wide for me but if I use a heavier sock than I usually would, they seem okay. I'm looking forward wearing them. They seem to offer good support.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN B.

customer_reviews.title: Boxy toe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is reasonably comfortable but is structured like a Keen shoe with a very boxy toe. It wasn’t what I was looking for and I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I have very narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I had read that these run narrow, but that was not true. Although I felt like they tied up tightly, the front of my feet were swimming, the shoes are wide in the front. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Caren Glacier

customer_reviews.title: Not like the old sugar pines!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Ahnu sugar pines before Teva took over the company. I feel like I could walk right out of these. They were ok around the house but not on a long walk. I will be donating these since I can’t return once-worn shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C Farlee

customer_reviews.title: Bring back old version
customer_reviews.text: These are not at all like the first version please bring them back. These that replaced them are hard and very round toe. Will probably send back.
customer_reviews.author: Vj

customer_reviews.title: Lucked out - Amazing price for amazing product
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! No breaking-in required. Fit as expected and lighter than anticipated. First trip out was on steep and dusty CA trails; I felt enough traction to walk around confidently in the dark with just a flashlight - no slipping and sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Perry

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof but weird
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff and weird pressure on the crease of left foot. Maybe it’s me, idk.
customer_reviews.author: abigail s.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with these Shoes. They’ve been comfortable right from the start. The shoe size was spot on. I was apprehensive to purchase shoes without trying them on, especially after reading some of the previous reviews reporting the sizes were off. They seem quite well made and durable. I’ve wore them practically everyday since I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Sneak!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Didn't have to break them in, and fit it is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The walking shoe version of a pair I have in leather. Took some searching to find them. True to size and comfortable right out of the box. Very happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Bob Engel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable and supportive for my back. I wear these during my work day as I am on my feet all day long.
customer_reviews.author: C. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the shoes. They were too narrow for my wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Soooie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried these shoes on I thought I should have gone a half size higher. They felt tight, but after a half hour they felt great! They are so comfortable. This is my second pair of Ahnu hiking shoes and I Iove them!
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable, waterproof, lightweight hiking shoes I have ever owned. They provide support, protection and they don't hurt no matter how long I hike.
customer_reviews.author: LilyandDave

customer_reviews.title: Water proof!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for working in garden. My feet stay warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie M Roumagoux

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality since Teva purchased Ahnu.
customer_reviews.text: This product has gone downhill since Teva purchased Ahnu. I loved Ahnu shoes before but now they don’t fit and are lower quality. Will not purchase Ahnu shoes ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Wore them on volcanic rock, uneven trails and kept good footing. Very comfortable. Walked for hours. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Fits and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I have worn in a long time. Will definitely by again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort to the max!
customer_reviews.text: I have five pairs of this design. I love the sturdiness and comfort, and I use them for everyday wear and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Burton

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get!
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about this shoe was the style and design. Comfortable and it fit exact to my size. Nice buying something off the internet that I didn't have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Heaps

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: Way too wide. Sold them to my friend with super wide feet
customer_reviews.author: sara robison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend them to anyone who likes comfort and casual style.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for high arch and high instep. Nice and lightweight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

product_meta.title: Ahnu Women's W Sugarpine Ii Wp Ripstop Hiking Shoe
product_meta.description: With closed mesh and a suede upper, this classic hiker keeps you comfortable no matter the terrain. A true best seller in the Ahnu by Teva collection, the Sugarpine ii ripstop wp shoe keeps your foot extra stable on challenging terrain with innovative Ahnu Numentum® hike technology.
feature_bullets: Closed mesh and suede upper keeps your feet cool and comfortable.
Aegis Antimicrobial construction sheds bacteria, grit and grime to keep things fresh.
Custom Vibram Outsole provides optimal traction in a variety of environments
